typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Fund as string,
		Asset as string,
		GLaccount as string,
		Id as string,
		Src as string,
		Date as string,
		Memo as string,
		Debit as string,
		Credit as string,
		Job as string,
		NetActivity as string,
		EndingBalance as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
source(output(
		Fund_ID as string,
		Fund_Name as string,
		Fund_Master as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT [Fund_ID]\n      ,[Fund_Name]\n      ,[Fund_Master]\n  FROM [relational].[Fund]\n  WHERE [record_deleted_flag] = 0',
	format: 'query') ~> GetFundMaster
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB select(mapColumn(
		Fund,
		Asset,
		GLaccount,
		Id,
		Date,
		Memo,
		Debit,
		Credit
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LookupFundMaster derive(Debit_Credit = case(isNull(Debit),'CR','DR'),
		Trx_Amount = coalesce(toDecimal(Debit,18,2,'$###,###.##'),toDecimal(Credit,18,2,'$###,###.##')),
		Date = toTimestamp(Date,'dd/MM/yyyy')) ~> SetDerivations
SetDerivations select(mapColumn(
		Fund_ID = Relation_Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID = Asset,
		GL_Code = GLaccount,
		Trx_Code = Id,
		Trx_Date = Date,
		Trx_Desc = Memo,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectForTarget
SelectSourceColumns, SelectFundColumns lookup(Fund == Relation_Fund_Name,
	broadcast: 'none')~> LookupFundMaster
GetFundMaster select(mapColumn(
		Relation_Fund_ID = Fund_ID,
		Relation_Fund_Name = Fund_Name,
		Relation_Fund_Master = Fund_Master
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectFundColumns
SelectForTarget sink(input(
		Trx_Code as string,
		Fund_ID as string,
		Asset_ID as string,
		GL_Code as string,
		Debit_Credit as string,
		Trx_Date as timestamp,
		Trx_Desc as string,
		Trx_Amount as decimal(18,2)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Trx_Code,
		Fund_ID,
		Asset_ID,
		GL_Code,
		Debit_Credit,
		Trx_Date,
		Trx_Desc,
		Trx_Amount
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> StagingDB
